info.name: Enigma API - Invalid XML Loader Tests
info.description: Negative test collection for Exercise 3 loader endpoint.\nRuns POST /enigma/load with invalid XML files and verifies 400 + error payload.

formdata.description: Invalid XML file to validate graceful failure handling

request.description: Uploads invalid XML 'ex3-invalid-abc-odd-length.xml' and expects controlled validation failure.

exec: pm.test('Response is JSON with success=false and error', function () {
